## agenc cron new

Create a new cron job (interactive wizard)

### Synopsis

Create a new cron job using an interactive wizard.

If a name is provided as an argument, the wizard will use it. Otherwise,
you'll be prompted to enter a name.

Example:
  agenc cron new daily-report
  agenc cron new


```
agenc cron new [name] [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for new
```

* [agenc cron](agenc_cron.md)	 - Manage scheduled cron jobs
